column4: when i try to restart xinetd, it gives me uknown instance.. i installed xinetd telnetd
when you enter 'service uinetd restart' the term 'uknown instance' is referring to the 'restart' in that command.
do you mean there is no such action as restart
apparently there is no suc action as stop
Perhaps I'm remembering incorrectly.  It might be referring to the 'inetd' part.  I am pretty sure it's the 'stop'
Since the script you are attempting to invoke has been converted to an
Upstart job, you may also use the stop(8) utility, e.g. stop xinetd
so i guess i should enter some command which would be something like restart
using service is the correct syntax.  Despite the system's recommendation
well, I gave it a shot. no lucj
